message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take the high road, let me have a bit more
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much!
You're getting low, I'm taking control
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much, again!
You're running out of time, take what you can get
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking the majority
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're almost out of time, take the crumbs
